attributes.title: Utterly disgusting
attributes.review: The things I saw were so disturbing and disgusting. Thankfully, this app is 17+. This should never be seen by children. I can’t unsee the picture. I want to gouge out my eyes. I can’t believe this app hasn’t been taken down yet. I will never escape the nightmares that have come from this app.

attributes.title: Awesome get the Real News
attributes.review: Here is where you find out what the President is up to

attributes.title: Might end your life, don’t download
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I as told it would improve my life, well to be fair they said ‘great again’. Instead, it accused me of being from antifa and said a drone was headed my way with a missile. I deleted the app, but I don’t know if that rerouted the drone or not.

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: this app sounded so good but then a week after it deleted my emails and hacked my contacts and sent a bunch of random text to people I don’t talk to so just don't download it made my phone crash and they told me that if I delete it they will kill my dog :((
Thanks for helping my get past the news dis-information outlets

attributes.title: Great App!
attributes.review: Share with all of your friends and family!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Do not get this app when I first open the app I saw a giant Chito my eyes are scarred second of all I took a whole day to download and I could not believe it once I open the app it kicked me out and I had to wait another 24 hours then the worst of all I saw a rapist

attributes.title: I hate you 🤮
attributes.review: This app is the worst, it gave me STD’s it made my life a living hell, I can’t stand trump anymore, hes taking away our rights for tik tok, like who tf does he think he is? Someone important, hes just an oversized cheater with a peanut for a pp, hes like an over grown orange and the fact he thinks he deserves an app disgusts me! And thats on periot

attributes.title: Not what you think
attributes.review: I assumed this was an official app for a legitimate presidential campaign, but I opened it and the first picture is of reality pop culture star Donald Trump. Oh my gosh - could you imagine a world in which he was running for president? I mean this is America ... we would never let that happen!

attributes.title: We need tik tok !!! And he’s trash
attributes.review: Worst app ever I mean is just no necessary like we get it trump you trash but you don’t have to put it in our noses and Bruhh are you really killing kids in cages just because they don’t have a pasaporte that say U.S.A on it man that just so immature we were better with Obama 😔🤚🏼
